text:
I had more than once to use J2EE applications build scripts where we had to
unzip normally some zip related file (zip, jar...) then to do a flat copy to do
the expected things. Having an option to do directly a "flat" unzip would make
the scripts executing faster saving this copy.
Moreover WINZIP has this kind of option ("use folder names").
thanks
